language.entry: Knight of chaos and order, the Fury is able to unleash multitudes of pain and suffering upon his foes. Wielding his two swords and wearing heavy armor he is able to take a lot of hits before going down, once he reaches his tipping point and the rage is unleashed, nothing can stop him.

The Fury, a knight with incomparable combat expertise is able to stun or bleed, fight with one sword or two, based on his emotional state. The angrier he gets the more capable he becomes, once he is enraged he keeps attacking until he misses.
The Knight Commander of the Order, Fury is an inspirational figure, he can encourage and train his companions, however the way he empowers himself shifts based on his mood.
I will handle this thing, just give me some time!
I know a thing or two about mending wounds.
We have come this far, i will lead us to victory!
I know you have strength within you!
Do not lose hope, we will prevail!
All your fears should be anger instead!
Let me give you a lesson.
This will improve your combat efficiency.
I am an excellent teacher, do as i say and we will prevail!
Friends, do not give up hope!
Let us show them how strong we can be!
This place means nothing to me!
I'm not spending any time here.
This is it, your end is nigh!
You had a chance, now you don't!
These moments are what i was trained for!
You think you can break my will ?!
This is where you prove yourself!
You are and always will be, worthy!
That is my secret, i'm always angry!
I will win this for us!
How can this be, my will is lost...
You thought i would break? I am unbreakable!
That is it! Now i will break them all.
Time to show what i can do!
You will feel as i feel.
This is what it feels like.
Let me show you how this is done!
I need to get rid of this fear...
Come out, come out, where ever you are.
Attack me again, i dare you!
Why join me if you cannot fight!
You need a lot of practice!
I'm pretty sure that we are doomed.
I am the reason for our survival!
I will win this on my own!
Might as well just finish this on my own!
There is no reason to continue fighting.
I think this is over, i have failed the Order.
Our lives are coming to an end.
All of you should retreat, i will take them all on.
I will win this for us.
Get out of my way and this will be over swiftly.
I have to move back, i cannot fight with this fear.
I shouldn't be afraid of them, why am i afraid?
I need to recollect my thoughts, i need to move.
I know they are going to attack me, i need to move back.
Let's see if they can attack me here!
Going forward, this is going to be good!
You want to kill me? Here is your chance.
This doesn't seem like a fair fight, i need to help them a bit.
Clearly i am not needed here, i will just move back.
I'm not sure what i need to do...
I'm so tired right now, can they just end me?
We are fighting as if we have a chance.
Can we just let it go?
I will fight them all on my own.
I'm sorry, i don't know what to do...
I'm not listening to anyone anymore!
I do not care what you think, i'm staying put!
No, that is not possible at this time.
There is no reason to do that.
No, that will not make a difference.
Why should any of us keep going?
No, i can't do that right now!
I want to feel more pain!
This will be a lot more fun!
I will do this on my own.
This is a better move at this time.
You are going to like this.
I now know what i have to do.
Pfft, I know a better solution.
This constant fear is crippling me.
Is anyone as scared as i am right now?
I don't want to be buried in this dungeon.
Look at that thing over there!
Something is sneaking up on us.
So far this has been a lot of fun!
I'm enjoying myself quite a bit in this place.
I wish I picked better companions.
You need to train a lot harder, you are so weak.
I'm stuck with all of you, aren't I?
I think if i wasn't here you would all be dead.
I should be the leader of this group.
I expect gifts for the things I've done for all of you!
We should just cook ourselves in this fire.
I just don't see us surviving this.
Maybe I should just go back...
Stay quiet so i can rest for a bit!
I think we should just leave at this point!
Can you stay quiet, i need some rest!
Over here you sacks of potatoes!
I'm the strongest one of this group, fight me!
I have nothing else to lose. I'm over here!
This entire journey has been pointless, i'm right here!
You are out of my league!
I see where this is going.
As expected, i knew that was going to happen.
Are you on our side or theirs?
I think you might be on the wrong side.
If we try to leave now they will kill us.
I'm not going anywhere, this is my end.
No, I refuse to leave, my path ends here.
I'm not leaving, this is fun.
Why should i leave if i'm having so much fun.
Let's just stay and kill them!
Why leave? Just finish them off.
Why am I so scared right now...
We are about to get ambushed.
Maybe i should have been faster.
Can you move out of my way?
Why are you in such a rush?
To be honest, i expected as much.
I think you should let me attack next time.
I think we need to leave...
I know what they are planning now.
That looked like quite a hit.
Maybe move out of the way?
You need to learn how to roll.
This is a very tricky situation.
This will not end well for us.
This place seems abandoned. Where is all the evil?
Where is a fight when you need one.
This is what the enemy wants us to do.
You are just trying to suck the joy out of everything.
No, why would I ever do that?
No, i am not doing that...
There is no reason to do that.
I just need some quiet time.
Can you just stop bothering me.
I will not do this, they know it's going to happen.
I do not need healing at this time.
No, that would probably kill me instead.
I need to feel all this pain.
No, suffering is the only way.
I will decide when to do that.
Why would you want to do that now?
I need to rip something apart.
That will not help me whatsoever.
You will have to do better than that!
Let me show you how it's done!
This isn't a good place to rest.
I think this place will be the end of us.
all this anxiety is so exhausting.
I see something in the dark...
Did you see that? Something moved in the shadows.
We need to fight some enemies soon...
I'm so bored, can we speed this up.
Who will we fight next i wonder...
You are all very new to all this.
You need a lot of training...
I should have travelled with the other group.
Why am I not the leader of this group?
Our lives will end in this dungeon.
No matter what we do, the end result will be the same.
Darkness will come for us all, very soon...
I need you all to be quiet.
We should all get some sleep.
This is not a good idea.
We are in a very peculiar situation.
I don't like this one bit.
I hope we fight more enemies, it's a lot of fun.
We need to fight shortly, i'm bored...
Why are you such a wimp?
I do not require that, but i guess it's fine...
Give me a moment of peace...
If you think this changes anything, it doesn't.
I think we should just leave this dungeon.
Just remember who the leader is.
Where did we get all this food again?
I think this food might be poisoned.
Do we have to eat right now?
The only thing that would make me feel better is bacon and eggs.
This is all for a lost cause.
I think i should probably just eat later.
Can we just skip all this?

Knight of chaos and order, the Fury is able to unleash multitudes of pain and suffering upon his foes. Wielding his two swords and wearing heavy armor he is able to take a lot of hits before going down, once he reaches his tipping point and the rage is unleashed, nothing can stop him.

The Fury, a knight with incomparable combat expertise is able to stun or bleed, fight with one sword or two, based on his emotional state. The angrier he gets the more capable he becomes, once he is enraged he keeps attacking until he misses.
The Knight Commander of the Order, Fury is an inspirational figure, he can encourage and train his companions, however the way he empowers himself shifts based on his mood.

Rycerz porzdku i chaosu, Furiat zarwno sprawia bl, jak i opakuje wrogw. Trzymajc dwa ostrza, ciko opancerzony wojownik nie upadnie od byle uderzenia, a jego gniewu nic nie powstrzyma.

Furiat, rycerz z wielkim bitewnym dowiadczeniem moe oguszy i zrani, walczy mieczem lub dwoma, w zalenoci od swoich emocji. Wcieko dodaje mu si, a wtedy nie przestanie atakowa dopty, dopki nie przestanie trafia.
Rycerz Porzdku, Furiat jest bardzo inspirujc osob, wspiera i wiczy swych kompanw, lecz to jak wzmacnia siebie zaley od jego humoru.
Ja to zrobi, dajcie mi kilka minut!
Wiem kilka rzeczy o opatrywaniu ran.
Dotarlimy tak daleko, wic zwyciymy zo!
Nie tra nadziei! Uda nam si!
To usprawni twoj efektywno w walce.
Jestem wietnym nauczycielem, zrb jak mwi, a zwyciymy!
To miejsce nic dla mnie nie znaczy!
Nie mam ochoty na spdzanie tu czasu.
To tutaj moecie udowodni swoj si!
To mj sposb. Zawsze jestem wcieky!
JA sam to wygram, nie potrzeba mi was!
Czemu, czemu czuj si taki zagubiony...
Mylelicie, e si poddam? Jeszcze czego?!
Po co wy tu jestecie?! Zrbcie co!
Zejd mi z drogi, sam ich pokonam.
Musz si wycofa, strach mnie paraliuje.
Nie powinienem si ba. Czemu si ich boj?
Musz pozbiera myli... Musz si ruszy!
Oni chc mnie zaatakowa, musz si wycofa.
Chcesz mnie zabi? To to zrb teraz.
Ta walka nie jest sprawiedliwa, troch pomog przeciwnikom.
Widz, e nie jestem tu potrzebny. Wycofuj si!
Nie jestem pewien, co powinienem robi...
Jestem ju tym zmczony... Moe mnie zabij?
Walczymy jak bymy mieli jakiekolwiek szanse...
Po co ja w ogle tu jestem...
Przepraszam, nie wiem co mam robi...
Mam gdzie to, co wy mylicie!
Nie, nie da rady tego zrobi.
Po co brniemy w to bagno?
Mam nadziej, e to bdzie bolao!
Kto si boi tak jak ja?
Nie chc zosta pogrzebany w tych podziemiach.
Kocham walczy, kocham krwawi, kocham walczy!
Utkwiem tu z wami, czy nie?
Wedug mnie, wszyscy bymy zginli beze mnie.
Powinnicie mi da prezenty, za kad rzecz, ktr zrobiem!
Powinnimy si po prostu spali w tym ognisku.
Jestem tu najsilniejszy, walczcie ze mn!
Nie mam nic do stracenia, zabijcie mnie!
Caa ta wyprawa nie ma sensu!
Tak mylaem, to si le skoczy.
O panie, ale z was tragedia...
Jeste po naszej stronie, czy naszej?
Mam wraenie, e jeste po ich stronie...
Leli teraz uciekniemy, oni i tak nas zabij.
Nigdzie nie id, to mj koniec.
Nie odejd std, to mj koniec.
Nie uciekn, tu jest tyle zabawy...
Dlaczego powinienem ucieka? To wietna zabawa.
Po prostu zostamy i ich zabijmy!
Nie mog, nie mog tego zrobi...
Oni tego chcieli, ja to wiem.
Moe powinienem by to zrobi szybciej.
Moesz zej mi z drogi, mieciu?
Oh, czemu mnie to nie zaskoczyo?
Bdc szczery, nie spodziewaem si nic po tobie.
Co za sytuacja! Czego ja si spodziewaem...
To miejsce wyglda na opuszczone. Gdzie wszyscy wrogowie?
Gdzie jest walka, gdy jej potrzeba?
Czemu miabym to zrobi... Po co?
Nie ma powodu, by to robi.
Po prostu potrzebuj spokoju i odpoczynku.
Oni i tak wiedz, po co to robi?
Nie, nie, nie. To mnie pewnie zabije.
ZOSTAW MNIE!!! Ja chc czu bl...
Ja zdecyduj, kiedy to bdzie miao sens.
Koniec kocw to mi nic nie pomoe.
To zy momeny, bardzo zy moment.
Ha! Postaraj zrobi si to lepiej!
Poka Ci jak to si robi!
To nie jest dobre miejsce na odpoczynek.
Widzielicie? Co si poruszyo w ciemnoci.
Ciekawe, z kim bdziemy walczy nastpnym razem...
Nowicjusz, w chyba wszystkich moliwych czynnociach.
Czemu ja z wami tu jestem?
Oto nasz koniec, tutaj, w tym lochu.
Cokolwiek zrobimy, nie wane ile si napracujemy, w kocu umrzemy.
Ciemno po nas siega, to tylko kwestia czasu...
Ta sytuacja jest dziwna. Bardzo dziwna.
Mam nadziej na wicej walk. Czucie blu to czysta przyjemno.
Nie potrzeba mi tego, ale nie zaszkodzi...
Jeli mylisz, e to wiele zmienia, to jeste w bdzie.
Wedug mnie niepotrzebnie tu siedzimy. Opumy ten loch.
A co jeli to jedzenie jest zatrute?
Zjadbym jajecznic i grzanki. Byloby suuuper.
Ta wyprawa jest z gry skazana na porak.
Raczej zjem pniej, teraz nie chc.
Oh, musimy przez to przechodzi? Idmy ju dalej!

Knight of chaos and order, the Fury is able to unleash multitudes of pain and suffering upon his foes. Wielding his two swords and wearing heavy armor he is able to take a lot of hits before going down, once he reaches his tipping point and the rage is unleashed, nothing can stop him.

The Fury, a knight with incomparable combat expertise is able to stun or bleed, fight with one sword or two, based on his emotional state. The angrier he gets the more capable he becomes, once he is enraged he keeps attacking until he misses.
The Knight Commander of the Order, Fury is an inspirational figure, he can encourage and train his companions, however the way he empowers himself shifts based on his mood.
